entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:37 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cobourg 9:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 53 %
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: WNW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 6. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
